docs.snippet: LIMA, Peru, Jan. 13 -- An Inter-American Labor Confederation, to be known as the CIAT, was established here tonight as the four-day Inter-American Labor Congress closed. At the final session a five-man commission of honor rejected charges made...
docs.lead_paragraph: LIMA, Peru, Jan. 13 -- An Inter-American Labor Confederation, to be known as the CIAT, was established here tonight as the four-day Inter-American Labor Congress closed. At the final session a five-man commission of honor rejected charges made yesterday by Luis Morones of Mexico against a United States delegate, Serafino Romauldi of the American Federation of Labor.
docs.abstract: Charges against him rejected, Lima inter-Amer labor conf

docs.snippet: Another cruise ship was added to the winter lists yesterday. Leo E. Archer, general passenger traffc manager of Moore-McCormack Lines, announced that the rebuilt liner Uruguay would make a special nine-day cruise to Havana and Nassau on Jan. 30,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Another cruise ship was added to the winter lists yesterday. Leo E. Archer, general passenger traffc manager of Moore-McCormack Lines, announced that the rebuilt liner Uruguay would make a special nine-day cruise to Havana and Nassau on Jan. 30, before she returns to her regular route between New York and Buenos Aires.

docs.snippet: WHILE Florida hotel operators, especially those in and around Miami Beach were reporting a slow start for the winter season, the Florida State Hotel Commission last week listed 1,522 hotels is operation throughout Florida, with 83,805 rooms and...
docs.lead_paragraph: WHILE Florida hotel operators, especially those in and around Miami Beach were reporting a slow start for the winter season, the Florida State Hotel Commission last week listed 1,522 hotels is operation throughout Florida, with 83,805 rooms and accommodation for 125,000 persons.
docs.abstract: Hotel Comm lists 1,522 hotels; operators protest transport difficulties

headline.main: IN THE FIELD OF TRAVEL; Florida Commission Lists 1,522 Hotels in State

docs.snippet: The American President Lines will send off its first authentic post-war contingent of cruise passengers next month on the second sailing of the new liner President Cleveland. Officials of the company in New York said final figures on the coming...
docs.lead_paragraph: The American President Lines will send off its first authentic post-war contingent of cruise passengers next month on the second sailing of the new liner President Cleveland. Officials of the company in New York said final figures on the coming voyage were not available, but that it would mark the turning of the line from exclusively commercial traffic to cruise customers.
docs.abstract: Clan line SS Clan MacLennon on maiden voyage

headline.main: Shipping News and Notes; President Cleveland to Take First Post-War Cruise Group -- De Luxe Sales Lead

docs.snippet: The market for sterling "forwards" was hit with particular force from Wednesday on, as rumor circulated again of a possible devaluation of the pound. This was traced to the early meeting of the British Chancellor of the Exchequer and the French...
docs.lead_paragraph: The market for sterling "forwards" was hit with particular force from Wednesday on, as rumor circulated again of a possible devaluation of the pound. This was traced to the early meeting of the British Chancellor of the Exchequer and the French Finance Minister on the subject of an adjustment of the sterling-franc rate which, observers say, cannot but have repercussion on the sterling-dollar rate.

docs.snippet: The liner Uruguay returned to private passenger service yesterday as control of the vessel was handed back to the Moore-McCormack Lines by the Maritime Commission. She is the second of the company's three "Good Neighbor" passenger ships to be...
docs.lead_paragraph: The liner Uruguay returned to private passenger service yesterday as control of the vessel was handed back to the Moore-McCormack Lines by the Maritime Commission. She is the second of the company's three "Good Neighbor" passenger ships to be reconverted for post-war service between New York and the east coast of South America.
docs.abstract: SS Uruguay returns to Moore-McCormack NY-S Amer service
